ComicInfo.Summary:
The Entropy Crisis: Big Bitch erases a databank
A Bagatelle In Hell: Poem about entropy.
Science Or Sanity?: A dream in rhyme.
Make Mine Mucilage: The Professor lucks out in love.
Posterity Is Just Around The Corner: Musing about philosophy in rhyme
Doodly Squats: A rhyme warning about the possible world of tomorrow.
Mr. Bunch Takes a Sabbatical: Seven assorted cartoons
Weirdo Art Section: It's Art For Art's Sake!: The Bunch loses her masculine side
Bloods in Space: Cartoon doodles
"Figure Studies" At The Art Museum: Earth has a visitation.
The Direction of American Youth: Assorted peoples' aspirations
Brombo the Panda: Brombo has problems in the real world
